title: Museo Thyssen-Bornemisza
knownFor: Completing Madrid's 'Golden Triangle of Art,' this museum houses an impressive private collection spanning eight centuries—from medieval masters to pop art, filling gaps left by the Prado and Reina Sofía.
ticketInfo: Part of the Paseo del Arte Card (€32.80 for all 3 museums - Prado, Reina Sofía, Thyssen). This combined ticket offers excellent value with 20% discount vs individual tickets. Free for under 25s.
